title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Competencies: Activity-Centered Scientific Inquiry for Enhancing Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Design systematic information collection and analysis processes using smartphone-based digital tools (apps, cloud collaboration) for scientific inquiry topics
Apply critical evaluation skills while visualizing scientific data (graphs, infographics) using digital resources and sharing them on social media
Derive scientific conclusions incorporating peer feedback via digital collaboration platforms (Padlet, Google Forms) and reorganize them into personal portfolios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
